item.title: Command problem
item.dc:creator: @del_piero1994 del piero1994
item.description:
@del_piero1994 wrote:

Hi i’ve added this code

[code]if (command.startsWith(“claim”) && command.length() > 10) {
String pin = command.substring(6);
//REPEAT THE BELOW CODE AND REPLACE dclaw WITH THE REWARD YOU WANT.
if (checkLog(“dclaw”, pin)) { //checks if the entered pin is in dclaw.txt
if (freeSlots() > 0) {

removePin(“dclaw”, pin);
if (checkLog(“dclaw”, pin)) //Making sure it really removed the pin
addItem(8002, 1);
else
sM(“Failed to remove pin from database.”);
}
else
sM(“Not enough room in inventory.”);
}
//TILL HERE U MUST COpy
else
sM(“Wrong Pin”);
savegame(false);
}[/code]

For example if i type ::firecape 574hj5
the 574hj5 is in a text document for donators, they get the PIN code and can redeem it in server
when you type it, the pin code is not removed

Read full topic
